Class PawnEventHandler

java.lang.Object
View.PawnEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>
public class PawnEventHandler extends Object implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>
Handles Pawn controls mouse dragged, released and pressed events.

  • Method Details

    • isCapturePossible

      private boolean isCapturePossible(Board board)
      Determines whether there are any captures available on given game board.
      Parameters:
      board - board object representing current game state
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one legal pawn capture and false otherwise

    • createRectangle

      size - rectangle horizontal and vertical size in pixels
